description: This file defines a utility class 'NotePretty' that provides human-friendly rendering helpers for 'Note' objects, including methods for displaying concise titles with relative timestamps and detailed creation/update timestamps.

classes.name: NotePretty
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to generate human-readable string representations of 'Note' objects.

methods.name: titleWithRelativeUpdated
methods.description: Generates a concise line with the note's title and a relative updated time.

methods.name: details
methods.description: Provides a detailed string with the note's creation and update timestamps.
